column1: Smoque BBQ////Got in around 11:45am and was lucky enough to only have to wait in line for about 2 minutes.  The brother ordered the brisket and I ordered the brisket sandwich.  Love the fact that you're able to choose your own side
column2: too!  The brisket itself is possibly the BEST brisket I've tried.  It's ridiculously tender and has a nice enough amount of fat to add amazing flavor.  The BBQ sauce itself is tangy with the perfect touch of sweetness.  The cole slaw is great--it's crunchy and is a nice break from the BBQ...and I don't even LIKE cole slaw!
